SRP.Q: Is the Retail Placement stage positioned above or below the Taste Testing stage?
SRP.A: The Retail Placement stage is positioned {below} the Taste Testing stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.A: The value of stage Product Concept is {1505}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Customer Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Customer Purchase is {430}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage In-Store Promotion?
VE.A: The value of stage In-Store Promotion is {651}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Product Concept, with a value of {1505}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Repeat Purchase, with a value of {248}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion?
SC.A: Decreased by {214} Thousand Bottles from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1394? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 339? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 758 and 964? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, or from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to {Launch in Market} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, from stage Product Concept to Taste Testing, or from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion?
NC.A: The reductions from stage {In-Store Promotion} to {Customer Purchase}, {Product Concept} to {Taste Testing}, and {Retail Placement} to {In-Store Promotion} are equal.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Product Concept} and {Taste Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Customer Purchase} and {Repeat Purchase} stages.
